statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'user' AND email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT username, role FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT username, role FROM user_authentication ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND password = 'password123';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username='Alice';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_id FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE users.created_at <= '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE user_roles.role_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY users.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.user_id = user_role_mapping.user_id LEFT JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id LEFT JOIN user_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN role_permission_mapping ON user_roles.role_id = role_permission_mapping.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON r.role_id = urm.role_id JOIN role_permission_mapping rpm ON r.role_id = rpm.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON p.permission_id = rpm.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
